description: This module defines all errors for the http-client module.

variables.name: err:HC002
variables.description: Error parsing the entity content as XML or HTML.

variables.name: err:HC003
variables.description: With a multipart response, the override-media-type must be either a multipart media type or application/octet-stream.

variables.name: err:HC004
variables.description: The src attribute on the body element is mutually exclusive with all other attribute (except the media-type).

variables.name: err:HC005
variables.description: The request element is not valid.

variables.name: err:HC006
variables.description: A timeout occurred waiting for the response.

variables.name: err:HCV01
variables.description:
This error is not defined in the specification but used by the Zorba implementation.
 It gets thrown when the user gives wrong arguments which are statically correct,
 but make no sense (for example: http:send-request((), ())).

variables.name: err:HCV02
variables.description:
Zorba specific error
 This error is raised if trying to follow a redirect for a POST, PUT, or
 DELETE request
